Author: Koenari
Name: Himbeertoni Raid Tool
Description: A collection of useful tools for RaidGroups, including loot management
Changelog:
+ Ui is now customizable
* loot distribution results include evaluated data in visual output
+ includes translations for Español, Français und Deutsch
+ you can now fetch gear from lodestone
* fixed several issues with second ring
+ add support for non-standard group compositions
* performance optimisations
